com.inamik.template
Interface TemplateActionTag

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTemplateActionTag, Capture, Else, ElseIf, ElseUnless, Foreach, If, Include, Macro, NewLine, Print, Set, Text, Trim, Unless, Unset, Until, While
public interface TemplateActionTag

TemplateActionTag - Action tags are the heart of the iNamik Template Engine.

It is recommended that your own actions extend AbstractTemplateActionTag as that class implements default versions of all 5 execute methods and all 3 afterBody methods.

Lifecycle - Actions have the following lifecycle:

init()
[
   setContext()
   execute()
   afterBody()
   reset()
]*
destroy()

Created on Jul 7, 2006

Author:
Dave
See Also:
TemplateActionConfig, AbstractTemplateActionTag

          setContext - Lifecycle method called after reset() and before execute() to set the TemplateContext that the action will be executing in.
